description.detailed: 2005-06-07: Latex version of docs for this unit are wrong, because ConvertString is not called to convert _ char. So _ is not escaped and latex fails. Also, HTML version is bad, because "With" is formatted in bold, because it's treated like keyword. Fixed by adding _ to AlphaNumeric in PasDoc_Gen in FormatPascalCode. Identifier_With_Underscores;
